00009 /**
00010  * the default html-helper, available in each view.
00011  * modify this helper, or build your own one.
00012  * @package kata
00013  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00014  */
00015 class HtmlHelper extends Helper {
00016 
00017              /**
00018               * build a href link
00019               * @param string $title what the link should say
00020               * @param string url where the link should point (is automatically expanded if relative link)
00021               * @param array $htmlAttributes array of attributes of the link, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00022               * @param string an optional message that asks if you are really shure if you click on the link and aborts navigation if user clicks cancel, ignored if false
00023               * @param boolean $escapeTitle if we should run htmlspecialchars over the links title
00024               */
00025              function link($title, $url, $htmlAttributes = array (), $confirmMessage = false, $escapeTitle = true) {
00026                           if ($escapeTitle) {
00027                                        $title = htmlspecialchars($title, ENT_QUOTES);
00028                           }
00029 
00030                           if ($confirmMessage) {
00031                                        $confirmMessage = $this->escape($confirmMessage, true);
00032                                        $htmlAttributes['onclick'] = 'return confirm(\'' . $confirmMessage . '\');';
00033                           }
00034 
00035                           if (((strpos($url, '://')) || (strpos($url, 'javascript:') === 0) || (strpos($url, 'mailto:') === 0) || substr($url, 0, 1) == '#')) {
00036                                        return sprintf($this->tags['link'], $url, $this->parseAttributes($htmlAttributes), $title);
00037                           } else {
00038                                        return sprintf($this->tags['link'], $this->url($url, true), $this->parseAttributes($htmlAttributes), $title);
00039                           }
00040              }
00041 
00042              /**
00043               * builds a complete link to an image. if relative it is assumed the image can be found in "webroot/img/"
00044               * @param string $url filename of the image (is automatically expanded if relative link)
00045               * @param array $htmlAttributes array of attributes of the link, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00046               */
00047              function image($url, $htmlAttributes = array ()) {
00048                           return sprintf($this->tags['image'], $this->url($url), $this->parseAttributes($htmlAttributes));
00049              }
00050 
00051              /**
00052               * build select/option tags
00053               * @param string $fieldName
00054               * @param array $optionElements
00055               * @param string $selected
00056               * @param array $selectAttr array of attributes of the select-tag, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00057               * @param array $optionAttr array of attributes for each option-tag, for example "class"=>"dontunderline"
00058               * @param boolean $showEmpty if we should display an empty option as the default selection so the user knows (s)he has to select something
00059               */
00060              function selectTag($fieldName, $optionElements, $selected = null, $selectAttr = array (), $optionAttr = array (), $showEmpty = false) {
00061                           $select = array ();
00062                           if (!is_array($optionElements)) {
00063                                        return null;
00064                           }
00065                           if (isset ($selectAttr) && array_key_exists("multiple", $selectAttr)) {
00066                                        $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectmultiplestart'], $fieldName, $this->parseAttributes($selectAttr));
00067                           } else {
00068                                        $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectstart'], $fieldName, $this->parseAttributes($selectAttr));
00069                           }
00070                           if ($showEmpty == true) {
00071                                        $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectempty'], $this->parseAttributes($optionAttr));
00072                           }
00073                           foreach ($optionElements as $name => $title) {
00074 
00075                                        $optionsHere = $optionAttr;
00076 
00077                                        if (($selected != null) && ($selected == $name)) {
00078                                                     $optionsHere['selected'] = 'selected';
00079                                        }
00080                                        elseif (is_array($selected) && in_array($name, $selected)) {
00081                                                     $optionsHere['selected'] = 'selected';
00082                                        }
00083 
00084                                        $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectoption'], $name, $this->parseAttributes($optionsHere), h($title));
00085 
00086                           }
00087 
00088                           $select[] = sprintf($this->tags['selectend']);
00089                           return implode("\n", $select);
00090              }

00092              /**
00093               * escape string stuitable for javascript or php output
00094               * @param string $s string to escape
00095               * @param bool $singleQuotes if single quotes should be escaped (true) or double-quotes (false)
00096               */
00097              function escape($s, $singleQuotes = true) {
00098                           if ($singleQuotes) {
00099                                        return str_replace(array (
00100                                                     "'",
00101                                                     "\n",
00102                                                     "\r"
00103                                        ), array (
00104                                                     '\\\'',
00105                                                     "\\n",
00106                                                     ""
00107                                        ), $s);
00108                           }
00109                           return str_replace(array (
00110                                        '"',
00111                                        "\n",
00112                                        "\r"
00113                           ), array (
00114                                        '\\"',
00115                                        "\\n",
00116                                        ""
00117                           ), $s);
00118              }

00121 /**
00122  * generate individual tags if debugging is enabled OR pack all files into a single one, chache the file,
00123  * replace with a single tag that points to a .php script inside webroot/xxx/ that reads the cached file
00124  * @param array $files individual files, relative to webroot
00125  * @param string $target js/css
00126  * @param string $tagFormat printf-able string of the individual tag
00127  * @param bool $cacheAndMinify if we should join+compress+cache given target
00128  */
00129              private function joinFiles($files,$target,$tagFormat,$cacheAndMinify) {
00130                           // debugging? just return individual tags
00131                           if ((DEBUG>0) || (!$cacheAndMinify)) {
00132                                        $html = '';
00133                                        foreach ($files as $file) {
00134                                                     $x = strpos($file,'?');
00135                                                     if ($x>0) { $file = substr($file,0,$x); }
00136 
00137                                                     $html .= sprintf($tagFormat,$this->url($target.'/'.$file));
00138                                        }
00139                                        return $html;
00140                           }
00141 
00142                           kataMakeTmpPath('cache');
00143 
00144                           // cachefile exists and is young enough?
00145                           $cacheFile = KATATMP.'cache'.DS.$target.'.cache';
00146                           if (file_exists($cacheFile) && (time()-filemtime($cacheFile)<HOUR)) {
00147                                        return sprintf($tagFormat,$this->url('katacache/'.$target.(defined('VERSION')?'?'.VERSION:'')));
00148                           }
00149 
00150                           // build cachefile
00151                           $content = '';
00152                           foreach ($files as $file) {
00153                                        $x = strpos($file,'?');
00154                                        if ($x>0) { $file = substr($file,0,$x); }
00155 
00156                                        $txt = file_get_contents(WWW_ROOT.$target.DS.$file);
00157                                        if (false === $file) {
00158                                                     throw new Exception("html: cant find $target-file '$file'");
00159                                        }
00160                                        $content .= $txt."\n\n\n\n\n\n";
00161                           }
00162 
00163                           if ('css' == $target) {
00164                                        $miniUtil = getUtil('Minify');
00165                                        $content = $miniUtil->css($content);
00166                           }
00167                           if ('js' == $target) {
00168                                        $miniUtil = getUtil('Minify');
00169                                        $content = $miniUtil->js($content);
00170                           }
00171 
00172                           file_put_contents($cacheFile,$content);
00173                           return sprintf($tagFormat,$this->url('katacache/'.$target));
00174              }
00175 
00176 /**
00177  * return javascript-tags for all given files.
00178  * if DEBUG<=0 all files are joined into a single one and are sent compressed to the browser
00179  * @param array $files filename of script to include, relative to webroot/js/
00180  * @return string javascript-tag(s)
00181  * @param bool $cacheAndMinify if we should join+compress+cache given target
00182  */
00183              function javascriptTag($files,$cacheAndMinify=false) {
00184                           if (is_string($files)) { $files = array($files); }
00185                           return $this->joinFiles($files,'js',$this->tags['jsfile'],$cacheAndMinify);
00186              }
00187 
00188 /**
00189  * return css-tags for all given files.
00190  * if DEBUG<=0 all files are joined into a single one and are sent compressed to the browser
00191  * @param array $files filename of css to include, relative to webroot/css/
00192  * @return string css-tag(s)
00193  * @param bool $cacheAndMinify if we should join+compress+cache given target
00194  */
00195              function cssTag($files,$cacheAndMinify=false) {
00196                           if (is_string($files)) { $files = array($files); }
00197                           return $this->joinFiles($files,'css',$this->tags['cssfile'],$cacheAndMinify);
00198              }
00199 
00200              function tokenUrl($url) {
00201                           $url = $this->url($url);
00202                           $token = is($this->vars['__token'],'');
00203                           if ('' == $token) {
00204                                        return $url;
00205                           }
00206 
00207                           $x = strpos($url,'?');
00208                           if (false !== $x) {
00209                                        return substr($url,0,$x).'?__token='.$token.'&'.substr($url,$x+1);
00210                           }
00211 
00212                           $x = strpos($url,'#');
00213                           if (false !== $x) {
00214                                        return substr($url,0,$x).'?__token='.$token.substr($url,$x+1);
00215                           }
00216 
00217                           return $url.'?__token='.$token;
00218              }
